page.name: Watch this short video - Differentiated Instruction goes to college! (Presentation)
page.intro: Watch this short video to see how a college professor applies DI in her classroom at Mary Washington University.
page.content:
The research base on differentiated instruction is grounded in elementary and middle school grades. But Dr. Laurie Abeel from Mary Washington University in VA discusses how she applies differentiated instruction to adult college students.

[Transcript of presentation]
